channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WooCommerce Upload Files
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WooCommerce Upload Files

item.title: CVE-2021-24171|2024-08-03T19:21:18.699Z -- unknown -- woocommerce%20upload%20files
item.description: The WooCommerce Upload Files WordPress plugin before 59.4 ran a single sanitization pass to remove blocked extensions such as .php. It was possible to bypass this and upload a file with a PHP extension by embedding a "blocked" extension within another "blocked" extension in the "wcuf_file_name" parameter. It was also possible to perform a double extension attack and upload files to a different location via path traversal using the "wcuf_current_upload_session_id" parameter.
